badge_template_activities.title: Provide evidence of your professional capability as an Axelos Consulting Partner to work with organizations in a consultative or advisory manner on ITSM or ITIL related projects or initiatives. You will also demonstrate that you meet the professional experience requirements and hold the relevant qualification(s) in ITIL 4 as specified by the Axelos Consulting Partner programme.

In addition you will have undertaken training in the Axelos Consulting Partner ITIL Maturity Model and understand how to assess maturity and capabilities of organizations using the ITIL 4 framework. ITIL Maturity Model assessors must pass an online exam in order to be recognized as an official assessor.

af455faa-a74c-4fa6-acd6-bbda10470016.description: The ITIL Specialist: Business Relationship Management certification demonstrates that that the individual understands the key concepts, principles, challenges and value of BRM and use these to establish and nurture the relationships between service providers and consumer organizations, and their stakeholders. They can develop and apply service relationship models to build competitive advantage for the organisation, and ensure stakeholders understand the strategic and operational requirements.
af455faa-a74c-4fa6-acd6-bbda10470016.name: ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST Business Relationship Management

badge_template_activities.title: The individual has passed the ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST Business Relationship Management exam.

Complete 5 points out of the required 20 in the practical application of ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST Business Relationship Management knowledge and skills within your professional capacity, either through professional practice or coaching and mentoring.

Complete 15 points out of the required 20 through chosen activities suiteds to the individuals professional development needs. These activities may fall within training and qualifications, community participation and self-study.

skills.name: Creation and Implementation of Target Operating Models

9de7db8a-d146-4d86-a7b7-2fba49a52c1a.description: The ITIL Specialist: IT Asset Management certification shows that that the individual understands the key concepts, principles, challenges and value of ITAM and use these to foster effective management of costs and risks, monitoring and ensuring compliance, and good governance of IT assets. The individual can demonstrate effective decision-making skills which encompass all aspects of the IT asset lifecycle including the ability to recognise and evaluate the sustainability aspects of IT assets.
9de7db8a-d146-4d86-a7b7-2fba49a52c1a.name: ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST IT Asset Management

badge_template_activities.title: The individual has passed the ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST IT Asset Management exam.

Complete 5 points out of the required 20 in the practical application of ITIL 4 ® SPECIALIST IT Asset Management knowledge and skills within your professional capacity, either through professional practice or coaching and mentoring.

Complete 15 points out of the required 20 through chosen activities suiteds to the individuals professional development needs. These activities may fall within training and qualifications, community participation and self-study.

skills.name: Creation and Implementation of Target Operating Models

c9f76e31-8400-4c28-9fb3-e254d2bf5ec8.description: RESILIA Foundation demonstrates that this individual understands the key terms and benefits associated with cyber resilience. They can understand and recognize best practice and know how to manage and address cyber risks.
c9f76e31-8400-4c28-9fb3-e254d2bf5ec8.name: RESILIA ® Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: The individual has passed the RESILIA ® Foundation exam.

Complete 5 points out of the required 20 in the practical application of RESILIA ® Foundation knowledge and skills within your professional capacity, either through professional practice or coaching and mentoring.

Complete 15 points out of the required 20 through chosen activities suiteds to the individuals professional development needs. These activities may fall within training and qualifications, community participation and self-study.

b08d3c8a-e51a-42b5-9003-7b8d18b7aa83.description: RESILIA Practitioner demonstrates that this individual has the practical skills needed to apply effective and beneficial cyber resilience. They understand what effective cyber resilience looks like and the risks and issues that can easily affect cyber resilience. They know how to get the best balance of risk, cost, benefits and flexibility within an organization.
b08d3c8a-e51a-42b5-9003-7b8d18b7aa83.name: RESILIA ® Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: The individual has passed the RESILIA ® Practitioner exam.

Complete 5 points out of the required 20 in the practical application of RESILIA ® Practitioner knowledge and skills within your professional capacity, either through professional practice or coaching and mentoring.

Complete 15 points out of the required 20 through chosen activities suiteds to the individuals professional development needs. These activities may fall within training and qualifications, community participation and self-study.
